extDesc.message: An artist-centered view of a DeviantArt Faves page
extDesc.description: Extension's description as it appears on Chrome's Extensions page

l10nFolder.description: Where the extension looks for more l10n files

heartX.description: Heart tooltip. Leave Deviant Love's name untranslated.

watchErrorNotLoggedIn.message: Your watch list couldn't be retrieved. It appears you're not logged in.

watchErrorInternal.message: Your watch list couldn't be retrieved, likely due to an issue with Deviant Love.

findErrorForbiddenCharacter.message: DeviantArt doesn't allow the use of $1 in deviant or deviation names.

findAmpersandHint.message: The exact phrase you enter in the find bar is treated as one term to search for. To search for multiple terms, separate them with: &

watchingThisArtist.message: You are watching this artist's deviations

subaccountsOpen.description: Tooltip for the report's subaccounts button

subaccountsErrorAlreadyOwned.message: That subaccount already belongs to $1. (Add $1 as a subaccount to add both it and all its subaccounts.)

subaccountsErrorNotFound.message: DeviantArt reports "not found" for "$1"; check your spelling. (A deactivated account can also cause this error.)

subaccountsErrorCommunication.message: Can't verify the account exists due to an error communicating with DeviantArt. Try again later.

subaccountsErrorOwnerIsOwned.message: $1 is a subaccount of $2, and cannot be added as an owner.

subaccountsWarningCantVerifyCasing.message: Due to a Deviant Love issue, the correct capitalization for $1 couldn't be determined. If you need to change it, remove it and add it again.

subaccountsWarningOwnerAlreadyAdded.message: You've already added $1 as an owner. The given subaccount was added to their subaccounts.

subaccountsEditorExplain.message: Know a deviant who has multiple accounts? Tell Deviant Love about their subaccounts, and all their artwork will appear under one name!

syncByBrowserOK.message: No problems detected! Your settings will be synced if browser sync is enabled.

syncByBrowserError.message: Failed to save sync data with this error: $1

syncByBrowserUnsupported.message: Sync isn't available in this version of this browser.
